review_text: We had Dinner with our Chinese colleagues here in both the upstairs hot pot and the 1st floor restaurant. The food was great both places.

Had dinner twice in this Chinese restaurant. Staff did not speak any English but menu was with pictures and in English too so no problem to choose dishes for foreigners as well. Prices were higher than average, food was delicious and service fast. I can recommend Beijing duck which was as good as duck in one of the most famous...
